instructions_to_main_agent: Install fonts via Google Fonts: Playfair Display, Montserrat, and Dancing Script.
Implement a 'Bento Grid' for the product section.
Use Shadcn for the 'Order Now' dialog/modal.
Ensure the Google Maps iframe is grayscale to match the aesthetic.
Do NOT use standard card layouts. Use overlapping images and text.
The 'Contact' form should look like a high-end invitation, not a SaaS form.
Use text-texture or grain overlays to reduce digital feel.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (e.g., transition: all).
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp) with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤– etc.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
